name: ocr_per_region
description: Allows different OCR engines for different capture regions. Perfect for multi-region setups with varying text styles.
author: OptikR Team

region_ocr_mapping.description: Maps region IDs to OCR engine names (e.g., {'region1': 'easyocr', 'region2': 'tesseract'})

default_ocr.description: Default OCR engine for regions without specific mapping

parallel_regions.description: Process multiple regions in parallel (faster but more memory)

cache_engines.description: Keep all OCR engines loaded in memory (faster but more memory)

performance.benefit: Optimal OCR engine per region type (manga, text, etc.)
